name: JuVentures
storyline:
Find all the hidden objects (and other easter eggs ;) while accompanying our heros, Nita and Snek, through the lovely drawn and highly detailed pictures. 
You can enter the drawn scenes from an Art-Gallery-styled menu; then you try to find all listed hidden objects in each scene. As you progress through the different scenes, you reveal more of Nita and Snek’s story.
summary: A pure hidden object game with lovely detailed artwork hand-drawn by JujiBla. Accompany our heroes Nita and Snek on their journey through the land, explore strange places and discover magical things.
